data.eml:eml: Description of a new fossil Statira Lepeletier et Audinet-Serville, 1828 (Coleoptera Tenebrionidae: Lagriinae) from Baltic amber of the Sambian Peninsula

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Telnov, Dmitry, Bukejs, Andris, Merkl, Ottó (2019): Description of a new fossil Statira Lepeletier et Audinet-Serville, 1828 (Coleoptera Tenebrionidae: Lagriinae) from Baltic amber of the Sambian Peninsula. Zootaxa 4683 (4): 508-514, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4683.4.2
